definition: bubble/foam/blister (i.e. skin bubble)/to soak/to steep/to infuse/to dawdle/to shilly-shally/to hang about/to pick up (a girl)/to get off with (a sexual partner)/classifier for occurrences of an action/classifier for number of infusions
puffed/swollen/spongy/small lake (esp. in place names)/classifier for urine or feces

sentences.english: The utility model is applicable to the administration for bronchiole and pulmonary alveolar.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型可用於毛細支氣管及肺泡的給藥。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the diagnostic value of X ray and CT findings of lobar bronchoalveolar carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討大葉型細支氣管肺泡癌的影像學診斷特徵。

sentences.english: After 6 h of injury, bronchoalveolar lavage was performed and lungs were collected.
sentences.chinese: 損傷6小時後行支氣管肺泡灌洗，收集肺組織。

sentences.english: The lumen of the acinus is small and narrow, but that of the alveolus is large and distended.
sentences.chinese: 單腺泡腔小而狹窄，但肺泡的腔卻大而膨滿。

sentences.english: Alveolus cavity enlarge with some alveolus atrophy under light microscope.
sentences.chinese: 光鏡下肺泡腔炎性細胞浸潤明顯減輕。

sentences.english: Conclusion The ground glass and honeycomb sign usually point out the diagnosis of bron…
sentences.chinese: 結論磨玻璃徵和蜂窩徵往往提示肺泡癌的診斷。

sentences.english: Objective To study the mechanism of damages of pulmonary alveolar macrophages caused by chrysotile asbestos.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討纖狀蛇紋石石棉致肺泡巨噬細胞受損的機制。

sentences.english: The alveolitis that produces fibroblast proliferation and collagen deposition is progreive over time.
sentences.chinese: 肺泡炎引起成纖維細胞增生和膠原沉積。

sentences.english: Influence of Nitrous Oxide on Minimum Alveolar Concentration of Sevoflurane for Laryngeal Mask Insertion in Children Kihara S, et al.
sentences.chinese: 笑氣對兒童喉罩插入時七氟醚最小肺泡濃度的影響。

sentences.english: Here is another more focal abscess in the lung. The alveoli in that area have been destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 圖示更侷限化的肺膿腫，肺泡結構已破壞。

sentences.english: Note that there is no alveolar exudate.
Strives for the pulmonary alveolus to gasify fully, increases the cough efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 爭取肺泡充分充氣，增加咳嗽效率。

sentences.english: This is another type of adenocarcinoma of lung known as bronchioloalveolar carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 細支氣管肺泡癌是肺腺癌的另一類型。

sentences.english: A proportion of subjects with negative smear results underwent bronchoalveolar lavage .
sentences.chinese: 一部分受試者的陰性塗片結果行支氣管肺泡灌洗。

sentences.english: AIM To investigate the effect of prenatal administration of dexamethasone (DEX) on the development of pulmonary alveoli in newborn rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察產前注射地塞米松對仔鼠肺泡發育的影響。

sentences.english: In this period, primitive alveolar differentiated while capillary blood vessel reduplicated quickly.
sentences.chinese: 此期毛細血管快速增殖的同時，原始肺泡分化。

definition: pleural cavity (part of thorax containing lungs)
